E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Mark Portugal
Dear Sir,
Mark Portugal has nothing more to prove at AA Charlotte O's!
He has an ERA of 2.50 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Tommy Greene
Dear Sir,
Tommy Greene has an ERA of 1.58 at AA Charlotte O's!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of John Marzano

He has an AVG of .327, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
